meanings.definition: The quality of soil for supporting plant growth.
meanings.sent1: The farmer ensured the tilth of the soil was perfect for the new crop.
meanings.sent2: The gardener improved the tilth of the garden by adding compost.
meanings.sent3: The tilth of the soil was so good that even the rocks seemed to sprout leaves!

meanings.definition: The condition of soil in terms of its suitability for planting.
meanings.sent1: Before sowing the seeds, the farmer checked the tilth of the soil.
meanings.sent2: The tilth of the field was ideal for growing vegetables.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbit inspected the tilth of the garden, looking for buried treasures.
